Steps.Message: Update at 18:04 - Engineers are on their way. At this point we believe there to be a fault on an underground cable affecting the Fairfax Road area. Until an engineer arrives on site, it's difficult to give a time of restoration. Using an average timescale for this type of power cut in your area, we're looking to have the power back on between 22:00 and 23:00. However, as the repair progresses; this may change. We'll update you again once our team are on site.

We became aware of a power cut at 17:17. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
